name: Ninja Goemon and Immortal Jewels
description:
Story ... Originally Iga ninja ,Goemon aiming at the master thief of the world in last years of civil war era...

---Introduction---
Goemon,originally the Iga ninja, and his fellow, Chutaro, the master rat, helped a certain woman on one day and got a red jewel.
.. Goemon is going to sell this precious jewel which is told to bring luck,
but people chasing a jewel an outcome ... they are rolled up in the plot.

On earth what is the everlasting precious jewel?
What is a wirepuller plotting a plot in the back?
And what is a thing which Goemon really has to steel back?

Characters with Goemon and others, famous thieves participate!
Civil war and thieves RPG here!!

---Story---
In this game, people in the history of medieval Japanese history come out.
However, it has become an attractive fantasy that anyone can understand.

Based on Osaka Castle, famous thieves are put together and they will explore the mystery of immortal treasure,
strengthening the equipment with treasure chests in the dungeon on the way.

While solving the mystery, the growth of Goemon party can be seen, and in the end it will become a hero protecting the people of Osaka.

---System---
In the game system we adopted the jewel system.

By putting jewel in a weapon, you can raise the offensive power and the power of ninjutsu, or gain special power.

And you can save anger gauges and give out the special arts the character has.

There is fun to collect treasure. Various weapons and armor and jewels will appear in the game.
There is a treasure box in the dungeon, its contents are random and change every time.
Please push through the dungeon while making full use of the item obtained.

Please check the state of game play as it is on video.

---Play times to clear---
11~12 hours
